CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 14, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Tom Thumb Wedding - This Tom Thumb wedding stole the show at the Novelty Fashion Revue at Brown Chapel Church last week. Left to right: Verdeen Butler, Walter Butler, Freddie Thornton, groom; Charlotte Wylie, bride; Robert LaMar, Charmaine and Joanne Stotts. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Tom Thumb wedding with bride Charlotte Wylie and groom Freddie Thornton or Eugene F. Lewis, walking down aisle in Brown Chapel Church for Novelty Fashion Revue
